[ Release Notes ] v0.0.1b (2025.07.17)
1. Feature Updates & Changes
â¦ Chat
âˆ˜ "World" chat has been renamed to "ALL" and is now set as the default chat channel.
âˆ˜ The color of World chat has changed from orange to white.
âˆ˜ World Chat cooldown has been adjusted. (5 seconds â†’ 1 seconds).
âˆ˜ The color of Field chat has changed from white to gray.
â¦ Bazaar
âˆ˜ The installation range required for setting up a Bazaar has been reduced, allowing more shops to be placed.
â€» With the update, any previously opened Bazaars will be automatically closed.
â¦ Wallet
âˆ˜ A feature to view the private key has been added.
âˆ˜ It is now possible to view the full wallet address.
2. Bug Fixes
â¦ Fixed an issue where the Bazaar remained on the map even when the Remaining Time reached 0 seconds.
â¦ Fixed an issue where mission progress was not increasing.
â¦ Fixed an issue where throwing just one copper would incorrectly complete the objective.
ğŸ› Your feedback matters to us at PLAY3. If you spot any bugs, please let us know anytime through the link below!
